DeleteDialog.title: Delete Game {id}
DeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this game? This will permanently remove the game and all its scores. This action cannot be undone.

ScoreForm.submitError: Error submitting score. Please try again.

HowToPlay.title: How to Play
HowToPlay.subtitle: PeakPuzzler Game Rules
HowToPlay.introduction: Test your knowledge with our challenging questions to climb to the top of the ladder!
HowToPlay.rulesIntro: The PeakPuzzler Quiz game follows these simple rules:
rulesList: Answer 15 increasingly difficult questions correctly to win
Each question has 4 possible answers, but only 1 is correct
The game ends when you answer incorrectly or finish all questions
Earlier questions are worth less money, while later questions are worth significantly more
HowToPlay.lifelinesIntro: You have three lifelines to help you through difficult questions:
HowToPlay.fiftyFifty: 50:50 - Removes two incorrect answers, leaving you with a 50% chance of selecting the correct one
HowToPlay.hint: Hint - Gives you a helpful clue about the correct answer
HowToPlay.change: Change - Replaces the current question with a different one of an average difficulty
HowToPlay.pointsIntro: The point values increase as you progress through the game:
HowToPlay.bonusPoints: Answering questions quickly can earn you double points for a limited time!
HowToPlay.leaderboardInfo: If your score qualifies, you can submit your name to the leaderboard and compete with other players for the top spot.
